attributes.additional_details:
The Clacton Gazette and Harwich and Manningtree Standard are campaigning to Save Our Baby Services. Proposals from the North East Essex Clinical Commissioning Group and Colchester University Hospital Trust could see Clacton and Harwich maternity units closed and all mums-to-be from Tendring sent to Colchester to give birth.
Sign our petition to lobby health bosses to KEEP CLACTON AND HARWICH MATERNITY UNITS OPEN.
